item.title: Have you already tried out Katana's native #HubSpot integration?⚡ 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗞𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗮 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗛𝘂𝗯𝗦𝗽𝗼𝘁 𝗲𝗻𝗮...
item.description: Have you already tried out Katana's native #HubSpot integration?⚡ 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗞𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗮 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗛𝘂𝗯𝗦𝗽𝗼𝘁 𝗲𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘁𝗼: 🔁 Automatically import sales orders from won deals ✅ Use triggers to keep order fulfillment and production in sync 📊 Make better decisions with accurate, real-time inventory and production data Get a shared source of truth between your sales and operations teams, and streamline your entire order-to-delivery process. 🔗 𝗟𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲: https://hubs.li/Q03dtBW90

item.title: 🚨 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽: Our product team has been hard at work and just released another highly-requested feature
item.description: 🚨 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽: Our product team has been hard at work and just released another highly-requested feature — 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀! 🙌 From installation and repairs to subscriptions and custom work, many businesses offer services alongside physical products. But most inventory systems aren’t built for that — until now. 𝗪𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗰𝗮𝗻: ✅ Add services directly to sales orders ✅ Track product and service revenue in one place ✅ Sync everything with HubSpot for smoother sales and fulfillment ✅ Get clear, accurate financial reporting across all revenue streams Whether you’re offering tailoring, training, warranties, or white-label packaging — you can now sell it all in one seamless workflow. 💡 No more hacks or disconnected tools. Just one place to manage everything you sell. 𝗡𝗼𝘄 𝗮𝘃𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝘀. Read the full article here: 🔗 https://hubs.li/Q03dhRBK0

item.title: From sales to production, seamlessly with Katana and HubSpot. Want to know how? 👉 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 ...
item.description: From sales to production, seamlessly with Katana and HubSpot. Want to know how? 👉 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗯𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗿: https://hubs.li/Q03d4mg00 Save your seat to catch a live walkthrough of our new HubSpot integration already this 𝗧𝗵𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 — and see how it helps manufacturers connect their CRM with production in just a few clicks. The webinar will be hosted by Shawn Coultice, Head of Channel Partnerships at Katana Cloud Inventory, and David Singletary, a seasoned software implementation expert and CEO of DJS DIGITAL LLC, who’s helped countless businesses bring their systems together. Whether you're already using HubSpot or just curious, this session will show you what’s possible. #HubSpotIntegration #ManufacturingWorkflow #SalesToProduction #Webinar

item.title: 🎉This week, the Katana office transformed into a full-blown Latin fiesta! 🌮 With our very own self-taught DJs bringing the heat ...
item.description: 🎉This week, the Katana office transformed into a full-blown Latin fiesta! 🌮 With our very own self-taught DJs bringing the heat with an epic mix of Latin beats, the energy was off the charts! 💃🕺 This event, led by our talented Katanauts, was all about coming together — dancing, mingling, and soaking up the good vibes. From tacos to tunes, it was a night to remember!

item.title: 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁𝘀? 🌊 Our Co-CEO Ben H. break...
item.description: 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁𝘀? 🌊 Our Co-CEO Ben H. breaks it down in his latest SmallBizClub article — agile and resilient supply chains are the key. 🔑 As we move through 2025 and beyond, leveraging technology to streamline operations, protect cash flow, and accurately absorb price fluctuations will be essential for business success. 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲: https://hubs.li/Q03cHDPt0
